name: DreamsJam2018
description:
Jam Info:

            Small game created in Unity for the Mini Jam Dreams (2018). 

Instructions:

             Use mouse for initial interface. When in main game use the arrow keys or click/touch (Mobile) the corners of the screen to move the character left/right. Avoid enemies, but grab the candy. Every candy = 50 points. Every 100 points you advance to the next Wave (which slightly increases enemy amount and speed).

Thanks for giving the game a try!

Note: Mobile worked on Android, however IOS test did not work on the 1 device i tested on. Also on Mobile audio takes a while before it begins working (probably a cache issue?).
